@description.name: @description
@description.body:
A toggle Button widget If the user tap the button, the button toggles between the ON and OFF state. Here is a little example of how to use the widget. 

   var button = new qx.ui.mobile.form.ToggleButton(false,"YES","NO");
   button.addListener("changeValue", function(e) {
     alert(e.getData());
   }, this);
   this.getRoot.add(button);

This example creates a toggle button and attaches an event listener to the {@link #changeValue} event.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {Boolean?null} The value of the button

@param.name: @param
@param.body: labelChecked {Boolean?"ON"} The value of the text display when toggleButton is active
@param.description: The value of the text display when toggleButton is active

@param.name: @param
@param.body: labelUnchecked {Boolean?"OFF"} The value of the text display when toggleButton is inactive
@param.description: The value of the text display when toggleButton is inactive

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the {@link #changeValue} event should be fired on every key input. If set to true, the changeValue event is equal to the {@link #input} event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Flag signaling if a widget is valid. If a widget is invalid, an invalid state will be set.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Flag signaling if a widget is required.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Message which will be shown in an tooltip if the widget is invalid.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Message which will be shown in an invalid tooltip if the {@link #required} is set to true.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Model property for storing additional information for the including object. It can act as value property on form items for example. Be careful using that property as this is used for the {@link qx.ui.form.MModelSelection} it has some restrictions:

  • Don't use equal models in one widget using the {@link qx.ui.form.MModelSelection}.
  • Avoid setting only some model properties if the widgets are added to a {@link qx.ui.form.MModelSelection} widget. Both restrictions result of the fact, that the set models are deputies for their widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the child control of the toggle button.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates the switch control of the widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the value [true/false] of this toggle button. It is called by setValue method of qx.ui.mobile.form.MValue mixin

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {Boolean} the new value of the toggle button
@param.description: the new value of the toggle button

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the value [true/false] of this toggle button. It is called by getValue method of qx.ui.mobile.form.MValue mixin

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} the value of the toggle button
@return.description: the value of the toggle button

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Toggles the value of the button.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler. Called when the tap event occurs. Toggles the button.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: evt {qx.event.type.Tap} The tap event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler. Called when the swipe event occurs. Toggles the button, when.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: evt {qx.event.type.Swipe} The swipe event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Checks if last touch event (swipe,tap) is more than 500ms ago. Bugfix for several simulator/emulator, when tap is immediately followed by a swipe.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} true if the last event was more than 500ms ago
@return.description: true if the last event was more than 500ms ago

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the field model value. Should also update the UI.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {var|null} Updates the field with the new model value.
@param.description: Updates the field with the new model value.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{null|Error} Should return an error when the type of
  model value is not compatible with the implementing class (the concrete field).
@return.description:
Should return an error when the type of
  model value is not compatible with the implementing class (the concrete field).

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the model value to its initial value. Should also update the UI.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns a consistent and up-to-date model value. Note: returned value can also be a promise of type Promise<*|null>.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {var|null} The model value plain or as promise.
@return.description: The model value plain or as promise.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The event is fired on every keystroke modifying the value of the field. The method {@link qx.event.type.Data#getData} returns the current value of the text field.
